title: Print, 1753
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper tipped into cream laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: Hoppenhaupt, senior del, 1753
dimensions:
Sheet: 40.6 x 64.3 cm (16 in. x 25 5/16 in.) 
Platemark: 39.8 x 57.2 cm (15 11/16 x 22 1/2 in.), irregular
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Interior with large mirror, fireplace, clocks, statues of nude figures, candles; two settees flank fireplace.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, 1753.
1753. Etching and engraving on white laid paper tipped into cream laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-221-4.
